title: Conjure Barrage
content:
Conjure Barrage Level 3 Conjuration Spell Weapon Damage 2d8Slashing Channel your weapon's essence into a destructive, widespread volley. On Save: Targets still take half damage. 9m DEX Save Action Level 3 Spell Slot

Level 3 Conjuration Spell

Channel your weapon's essence into a destructive, widespread volley.

On Save: Targets still take half damage.
